job.title: Culinary- Part-Time, Disney's Vero Beach Resort
job.description: Just 2 hours southeast of Walt Disney World Resort, this elegant old-fashioned hideaway is located on Florida’s scenic Atlantic Treasure Coast near the charming community of Vero Beach. <br><br>Culinary cast members at Disney's Vero Beach Resort have the opportunity to provide first-rate dining experiences while working for one of the world’s leading entertainment and hospitality companies.<br>With various Food and Beverage locations throughout property, Culinary cast members experience a world of options, from quick service to Five-Diamond dining.<br><br><strong>Culinary Cast Members receive a starting rate of $24.00 per hour.</strong><br><br><br /><br/><b>Responsibilities : </b><br/><ul><li>Provide first-rate dining experiences while working for one of the world’s leading entertainment and hospitality companies</li><li>Grow in your craft through continual learning and development alongside our advanced culinary team with years of experience in the industry</li><li>Help generate dishes from scratch for a variety of locations throughout property from quick service to fine dining</li><li>Work in a high-volume, fast-paced environment where collaboration is essential to success</li></ul><br><br> <br/><br/><b>Basic Qualifications : </b><br/><ul dir="ltr"><li>Show strong attention-to-detail, organizational, retention and problem-solving skills even while working under a sense of urgency and with quality ingredients</li><li>Ability to operate effectively as part of a team and communicate clearly to ensure smooth service operations and quality service</li><li>Proven knowledge of HACCP, proper food handling techniques, temperatures and food safety</li><li>Must have superior culinary, food production and high standards of excellence, including the ability to work cleanly, safely and efficiently</li><li>Possess proficiency in all stations of the line, including grill and sauté, as well as skills with knives, tools and kitchen equipment</li><li>Demonstrates the ability to follow recipes and an understanding of recipe conversion</li><li>Awareness of modern and classical cooking, including specialized culinary techniques and measurements, and possess the ability to propose menu items</li><li>Knowledge of basic butchering, food allergies, seasonal ingredients and menus</li><li>Must be at least 18 years of age</li><li>Part Time roles require FULL AVAILABILITY for any shift, a minimum of (3) three days per week, including nights, weekends and holidays.</li><li>Full Time roles require FULL AVAILABILITY for any shift, a minimum of (5) five days per week, including nights, weekends and holidays.</li></ul><br> <br/><br/><b>Preferred Qualifications: </b><br/><ul dir="ltr"><li>Culinary certification plus line cook experience at a table service establishment</li><li>Fine Dining experience is a plus, but not required</li><li>Full Availability for any shift, seven (7) days per week, including nights, weekends and holidays</li></ul><br> <br/><br/><b>Additional Information : </b><br/><strong>SCHEDULE AVAILABILTY</strong><br>Our Theme Parks and Resort Hotels operate 24 hours a day, 365 days a year and some shifts may start as early as 5:00am while some may end as late as 12:00am. Please note that the principles of seniority are used to schedule all roles.<br><br><b>SUBMITTING YOUR APPLICATION</b><br>After clicking “Apply for this job” below, the employment application will open in a new window. Please complete ALL pages of the application by clicking “Next” on each page, then “Submit” on the final page.<br><br><b><font color="red">IMPORTANT:</font></b><br>You may only apply once in a six month period. If you have applied within the last six months, please log in to your account to view your current application status.<br><br> <br/>
job.company_name: Disney Vacation Club,Disney's Vero Beach Resort
job.employer_name: Disney Vacation Club,Disney's Vero Beach Resort

job.title: Waterpark Maintenance Manager (Fulltime)
job.description: Overview:<h5><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; background-color: #ecf0f1;">What's In It For You?</span></h5><ul><li><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Full-Time position with competitive pay, bonus, and benefits plan</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Quarterly 401K match on up to 5% of your contributions</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Free passes for your family and friends</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Free admission to regional attractions and other regional theme parks</span></li></ul><p style="margin: 0px;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;"><span class="NormalTextRun SCXW95454342 BCX0"><strong>Job Summary:</strong> Six Flags White Water</span><span class="NormalTextRun SCXW95454342 BCX0"> is seeking a</span><span class="NormalTextRun SCXW95454342 BCX0"> skilled </span><span class="NormalTextRun SCXW95454342 BCX0">and </span><span class="NormalTextRun SCXW95454342 BCX0">dynamic</span><span class="NormalTextRun SCXW95454342 BCX0"> </span><span class="NormalTextRun SCXW95454342 BCX0">leader</span><span class="NormalTextRun SCXW95454342 BCX0"> to join our </span><span class="NormalTextRun SCXW95454342 BCX0">Maintenance Operations department</span><span class="NormalTextRun SCXW95454342 BCX0">. This person </span><span class="NormalTextRun SCXW95454342 BCX0">will </span><span class="NormalTextRun ContextualSpellingAndGrammarErrorV2Themed SCXW95454342 BCX0">lead</span><span class="NormalTextRun SCXW95454342 BCX0"> the </span><span class="NormalTextRun SCXW95454342 BCX0">maintenance, construction, and rehab of Six Flags White Water facilities, attractions, and rides</span><span class="NormalTextRun SCXW95454342 BCX0">.</span><span class="NormalTextRun SCXW95454342 BCX0"> </span></span></p><p style="margin: 0px;"> </p><br>Responsibilities:<p style="margin: 0px;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;"><strong>Essential Duties and Responsibilities</strong></span></p><ul><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Lead the Maintenance Department to deliver results in a broad array of activities including facilities maintenance, annual preventative maintenance activities, repair and rehabilitation of structures and equipment, landscaping and support for park operations.</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;" data-contrast="auto"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;" data-ccp-parastyle="Body Text">Oversee the broad array of facility-related maintenance, including HVAC, refrigeration, plumbing, electrical, carpentry, painting, masonry, roadways, and wooden and fiberglass attraction structures.</span></span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;" data-ccp-props="{"201341983":0,"335551550":6,"335551620":6,"335559685":360,"335559740":276,"469777462":[720,360],"469777927":[0,0],"469777928":[0,8]}"> </span></span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Ensure that the water quality program is being properly executed in accordance with the swimming pool standards set by Six Flags and Cobb-Douglas Public Health. </span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Ensure that the ride inspection programs are being properly executed in accordance with the standards set by Six Flags, Ride Manufacturers, ASTM and the State of Georgia. </span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Maintain and enforce Six Flags and OSHA safety standards to ensure safe operations for guests and employees</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Schedule, prioritize, and oversee park projects and goals.</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Utilize data from financial reports to layout annual department operating budget, and maintain fiscal targets through monthly forecasts. </span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Work closely with and support various Marketing, In-Park Service, Operations, Group Sales, and Human Resources initiatives to ensure successful implementation of all special projects, events and programs. </span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Provide leadership, coaching and development for the entire Maintenance Team. </span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Assist Maintenance Director with and participate in the implementation of capital projects and new construction projects.</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Occasionally serve as Park Manager In-Charge on a rotating basis. </span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Other duties as assigned</span></li></ul><p style="margin: 0px;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;"><strong>Status: </strong>Fulltime, Exempt.</span></p><p style="margin: 0px;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;"><strong>Pay Range: </strong>Starting at $85,000 (based on experience & certifications)</span></p><br>Qualifications:<p style="margin: 0px;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><strong>Skills and Qualifications</strong></span></p><ul><li style="margin-left: .5in;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Working knowledge of Maximo or similar Enterprise Asset Management systems.</span></li><li style="margin-left: .5in;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Working knowledge of various skilled trades including Carpentry, Electrical, Mechanical (experience with conveyor belts is a plus), HVAC, Paint and Fiberglass. </span></li><li style="margin-left: .5in;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Basic computer skills and experience with Microsoft Word and Microsoft Excel. </span></li><li style="margin-left: .5in;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Minimum 5 years of supervisory experience in a water park Maintenance Department.</span></li><li style="margin-left: .5in;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Advanced knowledge of swimming pools and water slides</span></li><li style="margin-left: .5in;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Ability to meet deadlines and understand cost implications. </span></li><li style="margin-left: .5in;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Ability to professionally interact with various departments and park guests</span></li><li style="margin-left: .5in;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Ability to write, speak and understand English with strong grammar, spelling, and punctuation skills.</span></li><li style="margin-left: .5in;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Able to meet the physical demands of the job including lifting, bending, standing for long periods of time, climbing, and working at heights up to 100 ft. </span></li><li style="margin-left: .5in;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Knowledge of OSHA rules and regulations.</span></li><li style="margin-left: .5in;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Ability to work outside in any weather conditions, nights, weekends and holidays </span></li><li style="margin-left: .5in;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Valid Drivers’ License and clean DMV report.</span></li><li style="margin-left: .5in;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Candidates must currently have an active Certified Pool Operator (CPO) license. </span></li></ul>

job.title: Waterpark Revenue Manager (Full-Time)
job.description: Overview:<p style="margin: 0px;">Six Flags White Water is seeking a dynamic and energetic leader who will manage all In-Park Services operations. This position is responsible for operating P&L Responsibility for Food & Beverage, Retail, Rental, and Warehouse operations to assure profitability, control of expenses, labor management, and cost of sales. This role will ensure the departments provide outstanding service, exceptional food quality, emphasizing organization and cleanliness, and an entertaining experience, to our Guests and Team.</p><p style="margin: 0px;"> </p><p style="margin: 0px;"><strong>What's In It for You?</strong></p><ul><li><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Full-Time position with competitive pay, bonus, and benefits plan</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Quarterly 401K match on up to 5% of your contributions</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Free passes for your family and friends</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Free admission to regional attractions and other regional theme parks</span></li></ul><br>Responsibilities:<p style="margin: 0px;"><strong>Essential Duties and Responsibilities</strong></p><ul><li>Responsible for all In-Park Services operations in the park including Culinary, Retail, Rentals, Catering and Purchasing/Warehouse.</li><li>Develop, execute and coordinate In-Park Services CAPEX, from concept through completion, on-budget and on-time.</li><li>Ensure all Federal, State, Local, and park regulations are being adhered to within areas of responsibility.</li><li>Ensure compliance with all State and Federal liquor laws as well as FDA health requirements.</li><li>Assure profitability of department by closely monitoring sales, cost of goods, inventory, labor and other operating expenses and fixed costs.</li><li>Oversee staffing and control labor expenditures for In-Park Services</li><li>Develop and maintain financial budgets and annual business plans for In-Park Services operations and prepare and present monthly forecasts as required.</li><li>Ensure exceptional food quality, product displays, cabana hospitality, seamless rental transactions and innovation.</li><li>Ensure that all team members are properly trained and equipped to perform their job responsibilities.</li><li>Develop and promote an entrepreneurial spirit by making recommendations targeting increased sales, profits and Guest service and satisfaction.</li><li>Adhere to all department and company safety policies.</li><li>Support the company mantra; friendly, clean, fast and safe service.</li><li>Serve as Park Duty manager as assigned.</li><li>Enforce all park policies and procedures and maintain all Six Flags standards.</li><li>All other duties as assigned.</li></ul><p style="margin: 0px;"><strong>Salary Range:</strong> starting at $68,000 (based on experience and certifications)</p><p style="margin: 0px;"><strong>Reports to: </strong>Waterpark Director</p><br>Qualifications:<p style="margin: 0px;"><strong>Skills and Qualifications:</strong></p><ul><li>Bachelor’s degree in management (or related field) or equivalent management experience in Food industry or Retail Industry or combination of both.</li><li>5 years’ experience as a theme park supervisor/manager of Retail Services or Culinary Services, restaurant management experience, or experience in multi-unit Retail or Culinary Services related field.</li><li>Strong written and oral communication and interpersonal skills.</li><li>Must be professional, energetic, self-motivated, and able to motivate others, and have a positive attitude.</li><li>Experience supervising large teams and interfacing with all levels of management.</li><li>Strong teamwork skills and ability to work productively across various departments.</li><li>Ability to multi task and have a keen eye for detail and follow up.</li><li>Strong planning skills and ability to teach.</li><li>Strong organizational skills and ability to manage multiple operations.</li><li>Budget planning experience and proficient in Microsoft Word and Excel.</li><li>Certified in Safe Food Handling and responsible alcohol service (TIPS) or obtain certification within 60-days.</li><li>Flexible schedule required including nights, weekends, and holidays.</li></ul>

job.title: Registered Nurse (RN)
job.description: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 5pt 0pt 5pt 0pt;"> </p> <p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 5pt 0pt 5pt 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif;"><strong><span style="color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Wages Up To $38.20/hr</span></strong></span></p> <p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 5pt 0pt 5pt 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Are you a critical thinker, a skilled communicator and passionate about caring for seniors? Are you seeking career advancement? As a Registered Nurse (RN) at Fountain View of Monroe, you have the opportunity to use your nursing skills and become a leader.</span></p> <p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">At Ciena Healthcare, we take care of you too, with an attractive benefit package including:</span></p> <ul> <li dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff;" role="presentation"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Competitive pay</span></li> <li dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff;" role="presentation"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Life Insurance</span></li> <li dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff;" role="presentation"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">401K with matching funds</span></li> <li dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff;" role="presentation"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Health insurance</span></li> <li dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff;" role="presentation"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">AFLAC</span></li> <li dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff;" role="presentation"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Employee discounts</span></li> <li dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff;" role="presentation"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Tuition Reimbursement</span></li> <li dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">In addition, we will help you advance your career with tuition reimbursement, discounts and other support</span></li> <li dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">You will join an experienced, hard-working team that values communication and strong teamwork abilities</span></li> </ul> <p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Responsibilities</span></p> <p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The Registered Nurse plans, coordinates, provides and manages nursing care, services and health education to nursing home guests.</span></p> <ul> <li dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38;" role="presentation"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Supervise the care/services provided by the LPNs, CNAs/STNAs and other team members who care for guests.</span></li> <li dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38;" role="presentation"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Provide safe and accurate medication-related interventions to guests.</span></li> <li dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38;" role="presentation"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Assess the health of guests and notify the physician of changes in status; promptly implement new orders.</span></li> <li dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38;" role="presentation"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Develop a plan of care based on assessment, implementing nursing care.</span></li> <li dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38;" role="presentation"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Select and institute appropriate nursing interventions to stabilize a guest’s condition and/or prevent complications.</span></li> <li dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38;" role="presentation"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Contribute to guest assessments (MDS/CAA’s) and the development of a plan of care.</span></li> </ul> <p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Qualifications</span></p> <ul> <li><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">1-3 years of experience in a long-term care setting preferred</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Current Registered Nurse (RN) licensure in the state</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">CPR certification</span></li> </ul> <p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">About Ciena Healthcare</span></p> <p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 10pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Ciena Healthcare is Michigan’s largest provider of skilled nursing and rehabilitation care services.</span></p> <p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 10pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">We serve our residents with compassion, concern, and excellence, believing that every one of them is a unique person who deserves our best each day that we care for them. If you have a passion for improving the lives of those around you and working with others who feel the same way, Ciena is the place for you!</span></p> <p>IND123</p> <p>#signon</p> <p> </p> <p> </p> <p> </p> <p> </p> <p> </p> <p> </p> <p> </p> <p> </p> <p> </p> <p> </p> <p> </p>

job.title: Certified Nursing Assistant (CNA)- afternoon or night shift
job.description: <p dir="ltr" style="text-align: center;"><span style="text-decoration: underline; background-color: #f1c40f;"><span style="color: #000000; text-decoration: underline;"><strong>Hiring For Afternoon Shift 2:15pm-10:45pm ** Night Shift 10:15pm-6:45am</strong></span></span></p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>Join us at our HIRING EVENT!</strong> This Thursday, 1/8, between 8:00 am and 3:00 pm. Walk-ins are welcome. The address is <span data-olk-copy-source="MessageBody">951 Hickory Creek Drive, Temperance, MI 48182. Walk in anytime during that time frame on Thursday to interview. </span></p> <p dir="ltr">Want to make a difference in someone’s life?</p> <p dir="ltr">If you have patience, empathy and a true desire to care for those in need, you will love working as a Certified Nursing Assistant (CNA) at Hickory Ridge of Temperance! In this role, you have an opportunity to leave a lasting impact on our guests. We look for candidates who are prompt, dedicated and enjoy caring for others.</p> <p dir="ltr">At Ciena Healthcare, we take care of you too, with an attractive benefit package including:</p> <ul> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Competitive pay,</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Life Insurance,</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">401K with matching funds,</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Health insurance,</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">AFLAC.</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Employee discounts</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Tuition Reimbursement</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">SPOTLIGHT, our virtual community and rewards and recognitions program, exclusively for Ciena staff members</p> </li> </ul> <p dir="ltr">In addition, we will help you advance your career with tuition reimbursement, discounts and other support.</p> <p dir="ltr">You will join an experienced, hard-working team that values communication and strong teamwork abilities.</p> <p dir="ltr">Responsibilities</p> <p dir="ltr">As a CNA, you will care for guests under the direction and supervision of a registered nurse or a licensed practical nurse. Some responsibilities include:</p> <ul> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Take and record vital signs.</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Measure and record height and weight, intake and output.</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Care for the guests’ environment.</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Assist with bathing, grooming and toileting.</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Assist with eating and hydration.</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Observe guests’ skin when administering care and reports changes to licensed nurse; provide skin care as needed.</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Meet guests’ mental health and social service needs.</p> </li> </ul> <p dir="ltr">Qualifications</p> <ul> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">High school graduate/GED</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">CNA certification</p> </li> </ul> <p dir="ltr">About Ciena Healthcare</p> <p dir="ltr">Ciena Healthcare is Michigan’s largest provider of skilled nursing and rehabilitation care services. We serve our residents with compassion, concern, and excellence, believing that every one of them is a unique person who deserves our best each day that we care for them. If you have a passion for improving the lives of those around you and working with others who feel the same way, Ciena is the place for you!</p> <p dir="ltr">#IND123</p> <p> </p> <p> </p> <p> </p> <p> </p> <p> </p>

job.title: Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN)- Night shift 7p-7a
job.description: <p dir="ltr"><strong>Join us at our HIRING EVENT!</strong> This Thursday, 1/8, between 8:00 am and 3:00 pm. Walk-ins are welcome. The address is 951 Hickory Creek Drive, Temperance, MI 48182. Walk in anytime during that time frame on Thursday to interview. </p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>Wages Up To $29.50</strong></p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>Night shift 7p-7am with night shift differential of $2.00/h</strong>r</p> <p dir="ltr">Want to make a difference in someone’s life every day? As a licensed practical nurse (LPN) with Hickory Ridge of Temperance you will work as part of a team providing skilled nursing and short-term rehabilitation care to our valued guests. If you have patience, compassion and a desire to care for guests in a gentle and empathetic way, you will love this role.</p> <p dir="ltr">At Ciena Healthcare, we take care of you too, with an attractive benefit package including:</p> <ul> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Competitive pay,</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Life Insurance,</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">401K with matching funds,</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Health insurance,</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">AFLAC.</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Employee discounts</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Tuition Reimbursement</p> </li> </ul> <p dir="ltr">Responsibilities for LPN</p> <ul> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">The Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN) plans, coordinates, provides and manages nursing care services and health education to nursing home guests.</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Supervise the care/services provided by Certified Nursing Assistants (CNA)/State-Tested Nursing Assistants (STNA) and other team members who care for guests.</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Provide safe and accurate medication-related interventions to guests.</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Assess the health of guests and notify the physician of changes in status. Promptly implement new orders.</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Select and institute appropriate nursing interventions to stabilize a guest’s condition and/or prevent complications.</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Contribute to the guest’s assessment (MDS/CAA’s) and the development of a plan of care.</p> </li> </ul> <p dir="ltr">Qualifications for LPN</p> <ul> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">1-3 years of experience in a long-term care setting preferred</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Current Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN) licensure in the state</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">CPR certification</p> </li> </ul> <p dir="ltr">About Ciena Healthcare</p> <p dir="ltr">Ciena Healthcare is Michigan’s largest provider of skilled nursing and rehabilitation care services.</p> <p dir="ltr">We serve our residents with compassion, concern, and excellence, believing that every one of them is a unique person who deserves our best each day that we care for them. If you have a passion for improving the lives of those around you and working with others who feel the same way, Ciena is the place for you!</p> <p dir="ltr">#IND123</p>

job.title: Registered Nurse (RN)
job.description: <p dir="ltr"><strong>Join us at our HIRING EVENT!</strong> This Thursday, 1/8, between 8:00 am and 3:00 pm. Walk-ins are welcome. The address is 951 Hickory Creek Drive, Temperance, MI 48182. Walk in anytime during that time frame on Thursday to interview. </p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>Wages Up To $37.35</strong></p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>Night shift differential of $2.00/hr</strong></p> <p dir="ltr">Are you a critical thinker, a skilled communicator and passionate about caring for seniors? Are you seeking career advancement? As a Registered Nurse (RN) at Hickory Ridge of Temperance, you have the opportunity to use your nursing skills and become a leader.</p> <p dir="ltr">At Ciena Healthcare, we take care of you too, with an attractive benefit package including:</p> <ul> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Competitive pay,</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Life Insurance,</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">401K with matching funds,</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Health insurance,</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">AFLAC.</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Employee discounts</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Tuition Reimbursement</p> </li> </ul> <p dir="ltr">Responsibilities</p> <p dir="ltr">The Registered Nurse plans, coordinates, provides and manages nursing care, services and health education to nursing home guests.</p> <ul> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Supervise the care/services provided by the LPNs, CNAs/STNAs and other team members who care for guests.</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Provide safe and accurate medication-related interventions to guests.</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Assess the health of guests and notify the physician of changes in status; promptly implement new orders.</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Develop a plan of care based on assessment, implementing nursing care.</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Select and institute appropriate nursing interventions to stabilize a guest’s condition and/or prevent complications.</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Contribute to guest assessments (MDS/CAA’s) and the development of a plan of care.</p> </li> </ul> <p dir="ltr">Qualifications</p> <ul> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">1-3 years of experience in a long-term care setting preferred</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">Current Registered Nurse (RN) licensure in the state</p> </li> <li dir="ltr"> <p dir="ltr">CPR certification</p> </li> </ul> <p dir="ltr">About Ciena Healthcare</p> <p dir="ltr">Ciena Healthcare is Michigan’s largest provider of skilled nursing and rehabilitation care services.</p> <p dir="ltr">We serve our residents with compassion, concern, and excellence, believing that every one of them is a unique person who deserves our best each day that we care for them. If you have a passion for improving the lives of those around you and working with others who feel the same way, Ciena is the place for you!</p> <p dir="ltr">#IND123</p>

job.title: Clinical Reimbursement Specialist CRS
job.description: <p>Are you a Registered Nurse (RN) who is passionate about MDS? When you join Ciena Health Care Company as a Clinical Reimbursement Specialist, you will share your expertise with the MDS nurses in several facilities. In this role, you will audit and evaluate Medicare compliance and the RAI process in our Columbus, Ohio and surrounding facilities. If you love teaching and communicating with other nurses, this is a great role for you! </p> <p>The successful applicant will have a comprehensive knowledge of Medicare, PDPM, RAI process, quality measures, as well as OBRA regulations.</p> <p>Join us with an attractive benefits offering:</p> <ul class="editor-ul tight" data-tight="true"> <li> <p>Competitive pay</p> </li> <li> <p>Medical, dental, and vision insurance</p> </li> <li> <p>401K with matching funds</p> </li> <li> <p>Life Insurance</p> </li> <li> <p>Employee discounts</p> </li> <li> <p>Tuition Reimbursement</p> </li> <li> <p>Student Loan Reimbursement</p> </li> </ul> <p>Responsibilities:</p> <ul class="editor-ul tight" data-tight="true"> <li> <p>Ensure the RAI process is complete and assessments are complete.</p> </li> <li> <p>Audit Completion of MDS, CAA’s and care plans within regulated time frames. </p> </li> <li> <p>Provide teaching as needed for MDS nurses in assessing resident through physical assessment, interview and chart review.</p> </li> <li> <p>Assist MDS nurses in follow up on resident care needs with care givers, including physician, nursing, social services, therapy, dietary, and activity staff.</p> </li> <li> <p>Reviews MDS nurse completion of information from hospital, consults and outside agencies and uses such information in the completion of the assessment and care planning.</p> </li> </ul> <p>Requirements:</p> <ul class="editor-ul tight" data-tight="true"> <li> <p>Knowledge of the Resident Assessment Instrument (RAI) process, including the principles the Patient Driven Payment Model is required.</p> </li> <li> <p>Knowledge of regulatory standards and compliance requirements.</p> </li> <li> <p>Registered Nurse RN in the state.</p> </li> <li> <p>50% travel with some overnight stays possible.</p> </li> </ul> <p>Ciena Healthcare<br><br>We are a provider of skilled nursing, subacute, rehabilitative, and assisted living services dedicated to achieving the highest standards of care in five states including Michigan, Ohio, Virginia, North Carolina, and Indiana.</p> <p>We serve our residents with compassion, concern, and excellence, believing that every one of them is a unique person who deserves our best each day that we care for them. If you have a passion for improving the lives of those around you and working with others who feel the same way.</p> <p>IND123</p>

job.title: MDS Nurse RN
job.description: <p dir="">MDS Nurse -Full-Time</p> <p dir="">Are you an experienced nurse who wants to remain clinically involved in patient care without being a bedside nurse? Are you organized, efficient, and able to manage your own work with autonomy? MDS nursing at Regency at Whitmore Lake may be just what you're looking for!</p> <p dir="">At Ciena Healthcare, we take care of you, too, with an attractive benefit package including:</p> <ul> <li dir=""> <p dir="">Competitive pay,</p> </li> <li dir=""> <p dir="">Life Insurance,</p> </li> <li dir=""> <p dir="">401K with matching funds,</p> </li> <li dir=""> <p dir="">Health insurance,</p> </li> <li dir=""> <p dir="">AFLAC.</p> </li> <li dir=""> <p dir="">Employee discounts</p> </li> <li dir=""> <p dir="">Tuition Reimbursement</p> </li> <li dir=""> <p dir="">SPOTLIGHT, our virtual community and rewards and recognitions program, exclusively for Ciena staff members</p> </li> </ul> <p dir="">In addition, we will help you advance your career with tuition reimbursement, discounts and other support.</p> <p dir="">You will join an experienced, hard-working team that values communication and strong teamwork abilities.</p> <p dir="">Responsibilities:</p> <p dir="">The Care Management Nurse, MDS Nurse works the RAI process and conducts assessments and care plan coordination for those residents assigned. Some responsibilities of the MDS nurse include:</p> <ul> <li dir=""> <p dir="">Completes the MDS, CAA’s and care plans within regulated time frames.</p> </li> <li dir=""> <p dir="">Assesses resident through physical assessment, interview and chart review.</p> </li> <li dir=""> <p dir="">Discusses resident care needs with care givers, including physician, nursing, social services, therapy, dietary, and activity staff.</p> </li> <li dir=""> <p dir="">Reviews information from hospital, consults and outside agencies and uses such information in the completion of the assessment and care planning.</p> </li> <ul> <li dir=""> <p dir="">Coordinates, identifies, and/or initiates significant change MDS’</p> </li> <li dir=""> <p dir="">Is prepared to conduct PPS meetings maintaining MDS assessments per Medicare schedule and maintains PPS board for monitoring of Medicare days and RUGs utilization in the absence of the Care Management Coordinator</p> </li> </ul> <li dir=""> <p dir="">Remains current with the American Association of Nursing Assessment Coordinators (AANAC) requirements.</p> </li> </ul> <p dir="">Qualifications:</p> <ul> <li dir=""> <p dir="">Registered Nurse, RN or Licensed Practical Nurse</p> </li> <li dir=""> <p dir="">AANC certification a plus. RAC-CT</p> </li> <li dir=""> <p dir="">Knowledge of the Resident Assessment Instrument (RAI) process, including the principles the Prospective Payment Process (PPS) strongly preferred.</p> </li> <li dir=""> <p dir="">Experience as an MDS Nurse</p> </li> </ul> <p> </p> <p><strong>About Ciena Healthcare</strong></p> <p dir="">Ciena Healthcare is Michigan’s largest provider of skilled nursing and rehabilitation care services.</p> <p dir=""> We serve our residents with compassion, concern, and excellence, believing that every one of them is a unique person who deserves our best each day that we care for them. If you have a passion for improving the lives of those around you and working with others who feel the same way, Ciena is the place for you!</p> <p dir="">IND123</p>

job.title: Physical Therapist (PT) - Home Health
job.description: <br><br><b>Overview</b><p style="margin: 0px; text-align: center;"><strong><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">$5,000 Sign On Bonus</span></strong></p><p style="margin: 0px;"> </p><p style="margin-bottom: .0001pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Are you in search of a new career opportunity that makes a meaningful impact? If so, now is the time to find your calling at Enhabit Home Health & Hospice.</span></p><p style="margin-bottom: .0001pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;"> </span></p><p style="margin-bottom: .0001pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">As a national leader in home-based care, Enhabit is consistently ranked as one of the best places to work in the country. We’re committed to expanding what’s possible for patient care in the home, all while fostering a unique culture that is both innovative and collaborative.</span></p><p style="margin-bottom: .0001pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;"> </span></p><p style="margin-bottom: .0001pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">At Enhabit, the best of what’s next starts with us. We not only make it a priority to maintain an ethical and stable workplace but also continually invest in our employees. By extending ongoing professional development opportunities and providing cutting-edge technology solutions, we ensure our employees are always moving their careers forward and prepared to deliver a better way to care for our patients. </span></p><p style="margin-bottom: .0001pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;"> </span></p><p style="margin-bottom: .0001pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Ever-mindful of the need for employees to care for themselves and their families, Enhabit offers competitive benefits that support and promote healthy lifestyle choices. Subject to employee eligibility, some benefits, tools and resources include:</span></p><ul><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Generous time off with pay for full-time employees</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Continuing education opportunities</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Scholarship program for employees</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Matching 401(k) plan for all employees</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Comprehensive insurance plans for medical, dental and vision coverage for full-time employees</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Supplemental insurance policies for life, disability, critical illness, hospital indemnity and accident insurance plans for full-time employees</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Flexible spending account plans for full-time employees</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Minimum essential coverage health insurance plan for all employees</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Electronic medical records and mobile devices for all clinicians</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Incentivized bonus plan</span></li></ul><br><br> <b>Responsibilities</b><br><p style="margin-bottom: 0in;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">Our Physical Therapists examine and treat patients with physical impairments through the use of physical modalities. The goal is to assist persons who are physically challenged to improve mobility and function, independent self-care, other skills necessary for functioning in daily living. We have Specialty Programs that include </span></p><ul><li><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">Balance and Fall Prevention</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">Spine Safety</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">Total Hip and Knee Replacement Program</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">Total Shoulder Replacement Program.</span></li></ul><p style="margin-bottom: 0in;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">He/she administers skilled care to clients requiring intermittent professional services and teaches the family and other members of the health care team. These services are performed in accordance with the physician’s orders and the established plan of care, under the direction and supervision of the Branch Director. </span></p><br><br><b>Qualifications</b><br><ol><li>Must possess a valid state driver’s license.</li><li>Must possess automobile liability insurance.</li><li>Must be currently licensed in the state of employment.</li></ol><br><br> <b>Additional Information</b><br><p style="margin: 0px;"><em><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">Enhabit Home Health & Hospice is an equal opportunity employer. We work to promote differences in a collaborative and respectful manner. We are committed to a work environment that supports, encourages and motivates all individuals without discrimination on the basis of race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, age, disability, national or ethnic origin, military service status, citizenship, genetic information, or other protected characteristic. At Enhabit, we celebrate and embrace the special differences that makes our community extraordinary.</span></em></p><p style="margin: 0px;"> </p><p style="margin: 0px;"><em><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">#HTF</span></em></p>
